SELECT a.menuId id, a.parentId pId, a.menuName name, IF(b.menuId IS NULL, FALSE, TRUE) checked FROM sys_menu a LEFT JOIN (SELECT menuId FROM sys_role_menu WHERE roleId = #{roleId, jdbcType=BIGINT}) b ON a.menuId = b.menuId WHERE a.`status` = 1 AND a.visible = 1
AND a.menuType = #{menuType, jdbcType=TINYINT},
ORDER BY a.sort ASC
